m:MaterialTitle.title: TextBox
m:MaterialTitle.description: Text fields allow user input. The border should light up simply and clearly indicating which field the user is currently editing.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Textarea
m:MaterialTitle.description: Textareas allow larger expandable user input. The border should light up simply and clearly indicating which field the user is currently editing.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Character Counter
m:MaterialTitle.description: Use a character counter in fields where a character restriction is in place.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialTextBox placeholder="Input Text" length="10"/>
<m:MaterialTextArea placeholder="Text Area" length="120"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: Number Value Box
m:MaterialTitle.description: We provided additional value boxes : Material Float, Integer, Double and Long boxes for specific data format.

m:MaterialRow.m.demo:PrettyPre:
<!-- MaterialNumber boxes -->
<m:MaterialTitle title="Number Value Box" description="We provided additional value boxes : Material Float, Integer, Double and Long boxes for specific data format." />
<!-- Float box -->
<m:MaterialFloatBox ui:field="txtFloatBox" placeholder="Float value"/>
<!-- Integer box -->
<m:MaterialIntegerBox ui:field="txtIntegerBox" placeholder="Integer value"/>
<!-- Double box -->
<m:MaterialDoubleBox ui:field="txtDoubleBox" placeholder="Double value"/>
<!-- Long Box -->
<m:MaterialLongBox ui:field="txtLongBox" placeholder="Long value"/>
txtFloatBox.setValue(1000.25f);
txtIntegerBox.setValue(10);
txtDoubleBox.setValue(9999.90);
txtLongBox.setValue((long) 1000.00);

m:MaterialTitle.title: Disabled Styles
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can disable any text field by adding enabled='false'

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialTextBox enabled="false" placeholder="TextBox" />
<m:MaterialTextArea enabled="false" placeholder="TextArea" />
<m:MaterialFloatBox enabled="false" placeholder="FloatBox"/>
<m:MaterialIntegerBox enabled="false" placeholder="IntegerBox"/>
<m:MaterialDoubleBox enabled="false" placeholder="DoubleBox"/>
<m:MaterialLongBox enabled="false" placeholder="LongBox"/>

m:MaterialTitle.title: ListBox
m:MaterialTitle.description: Select allows user input through specified options.

m:MaterialTitle.title: ChangeHandler
m:MaterialTitle.description: Add the code below to trigger any events on listbox

m:MaterialTitle.title: Old Browser List Box
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can add an attribute old='true' to get the browser default listbox.

m:MaterialTitle.title: Disabled Styles
m:MaterialTitle.description: You can also add an attribute disabled='true' to the select element to make the whole thing disabled. Or if you add disabled to the options, the individual options will be unselectable.

m:MaterialRow.demo:PrettyPre:
<m:MaterialListBox old="true" enabled="false">
<m.html:Option text="Option 1"/>
<m.html:Option text="Option 2"/>
<m.html:Option text="Option 3"/>
<m.html:Option text="Option 4"/>
<m:MaterialListBox old="true" enabled="false">
<m.html:Option text="Option 1"/>
<m.html:Option text="Option 2"/>
<m.html:Option text="Option 3"/>
<m.html:Option text="Option 4"/>
</m:MaterialListBox>

<m:MaterialRadioButton name="color" text="Yellow" />
<m:MaterialRadioButton name="color" text="Green" />
<m:MaterialRadioButton name="color" text="Brown" enabled="false" />
